title: Review Exam: Financial Products
description: Weekly review of cards, loans and conditionals.

items.prompt: The maximum amount you can spend on your credit card is the...
items.explanation: Credit limit is the cap on spending for a credit account.

items.prompt: A monthly payment for a loan is called an...
items.explanation: Installments are the regular payments made to repay a debt.

items.prompt: If the interest rates ___ (go) up, your mortgage payments ___ (increase).
items.explanation: First conditional structure: If + Present Simple, will + verb.
